title: `publish` is not able to force-push, it seems
body:
````
mih@medusa ~/pd/forrest_gump/collection (git)-[master] % datalad publish --to github
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/home/mih/pd/forrest_gump/collection> to github 
No handlers could be found for logger "git.remote"
[ERROR  ] failed to push to github: master -> github/master [rejected] (non-fast-forward); pushed: ['[new branch]'] [publish(/home/mih/pd/forrest_gump/collection)] 
datalad publish --to github  5,84s user 2,14s system 70% cpu 11,249 total
1 mih@medusa ~/pd/forrest_gump/collection (git)-[master] % datalad publish --to github -f
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/home/mih/pd/forrest_gump/collection> to github 
No handlers could be found for logger "git.remote"
[ERROR  ] failed to push to github: master -> github/master [rejected] (non-fast-forward); pushed: ['[up to date]'] [publish(/home/mih/pd/forrest_gump/collection)] 
datalad publish --to github -f  4,72s user 1,79s system 66% cpu 9,773 total
1 mih@medusa ~/pd/forrest_gump/collection (git)-[master] % datalad publish --to github --git-opts '--force'
usage: datalad publish [--version] [-h] [-l LEVEL] [--pbs-runner {condor}]
                       [-d DATASET] [--to LABEL] [--since SINCE]
                       [--missing MODE] [-f] [--transfer-data TRANSFER_DATA]
                       [-r] [--recursion-limit LEVELS] [--git-opts STRING]
                       [--annex-opts STRING] [--annex-copy-opts STRING]
                       [PATH [PATH ...]]
datalad publish: error: argument --git-opts: expected one argument
2 mih@medusa ~/pd/forrest_gump/collection (git)-[master] % datalad publish --to github --git-opts ' --force'
[INFO   ] Publishing <Dataset path=/home/mih/pd/forrest_gump/collection> to github 
No handlers could be found for logger "git.remote"
[ERROR  ] failed to push to github: master -> github/master [rejected] (non-fast-forward); pushed: ['[up to date]'] [publish(/home/mih/pd/forrest_gump/collection)] 
datalad publish --to github --git-opts ' --force'  4,79s user 1,91s system 68% cpu 9,740 total

````
